src_text: Isibonelelo Sokusiza Umphakathi Oxakekile (i-SRD) Ngenxa yeSifo segciwane Ie-Corona (i-COVID-19) IKhabhinethi liyabazi ubunzima obudalwe ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19 kanye nodlame lomphakathi lwakamuva ezingxenyeni ezithile KwaZulu-Natali nase-Gauten Ngenxa yalokhu, likhumbuze izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthi izicelo zesibonelelo sezwe i-COVID-19 SRD sokweseka abantu abangenayo imalingeniso sivulwe ngoLwesihlanu, ziyi-6 kuNcwaba 2021.
trg_text: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Social Relief of Distress (SRD) Grant Cabinet is conscious of the hardships caused by the COVID-19 pandemic and the recent public violence in some parts of KwaZulu-Natal and Gauten In this regard, it reminded South Africans that applications for the country s COVID-19 SRD Grant to support people who have no income opened on Friday, 6 August 2021.

src_text: Inhlangano Yezimpesheni Nezibonelelo Zikahulumeni eNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA) ivule izindlela ezintsha zokuthumela izicelo okungaba yi-govchaapp ne-Facebook Messenger, phezu kwewebhusayithi: https://srsassgoza noma nge-WhatsApp ku-082 046 8553.
trg_text: The South African Social Security Agency (SASSA) has opened new channels where applications can be submitted via the govchaapp and Facebook Messenger, in addition to its website: https://srsassgoza or through WhatsApp on 082 046 8553.

src_text: Kumele abantu abaphakathi kweminyaka eyi-18 nama-60 abangenayo nhlobo imali abaziphilisa ngayo bafake izicel Isibonelelo sika-R350 ngenyanga siyindlela ebalulekile imindeni engaphephela kuyo kunokuba ibulawe yisihlava sobubha nokungasebenzi Ezamandla
trg_text: People between the ages of 18 and 60 who have no financial support of any kind should appl The R350 per month grant is an important safety net for families who would otherwise be devastated by the scourge of poverty and unemployment Energy

src_text: Ukushintsha kwegama IKhabhinethi lamukele ukuqanjwa kabusha kwe-Brandfort e-Free State yaba yi-Winnie Mandela, ukuhlonipha iqhawe lomzabalazo nenkululeko eladingiswa kulela dolobha ngesikhathi sobandlululo Ukukhumbula izigameko zase-Marikana
trg_text: Name change Cabinet welcomed the renaming of Brandfort in the Free State to Winnie Mandela, in honour of the Struggle and liberation icon who was banished to the town during the height of apartheid Marikana commemoration

src_text: IKhabhinethi lihlanganyele nezwe ekukhumbuleni izibhicongo ezenzeka e-Marikana eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngoNcwaba 2012, futhi lazisa ubuhlungu babasebenzi nemindeni yabo kanye nezwe lilonkan Njengezwe sizoma ekutheni lesi sigemegeme singaphinde senzeke futh Amaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) asebe nenqubekela-phambili enkulu ekuqaliseni izincomo zeKhomishana Yophenyo ka-Farla Ezinye zazo zizoqaliswa ngokugcwele uma iPhalamende selichibiyele eminye yemithethonqubo ye-SAP
trg_text: Cabinet joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that took place at Marikana in North West in August 2012, and recognises the anguish of workers, their families and the nation at larg As a nation we remain resolute that such a tragedy must never happen agai Great progress has been made by the South African Police Service (SAPS) to implement the recommendations of the Farlam Commission of Inquir Some of which will be fully implemented once the relevant SAPS legislations have been amended in Parliamen

src_text: IKhabhinethi lijabule kakhulu ngokuthi sekube nengqubekela-phambili enkulu maqondana nokunxephezela izisulu zalezi zigemegeme nezihlobo zaz IHhovisi Lommeli Kahulumeni Jikelele selisebenze inqwaba yezicelo-zinxephezelo, futhi ligcine ukukhokha kuNhlangulana 2021.
trg_text: Cabinet was also pleased with great progress that has been made regarding the reparation of the victims of the tragedy and their relative The Office of the Solicitor-General has processed a majority of the claims, with the last payment done in June 2021.

src_text: Izicelo-zinxephezelo ezisilele zilindele ukuthunyelwa kwayo yonke imibhalo efanel
trg_text: The outstanding claims await the submission of all the relevant documentation

src_text: IKhabhinethi linxuse abameli bezisulu ukuba basebenze ngokushesha ukuze kuphothulwe izicelo-zinxephezelo ezisel IHhovisi LoMmeli Wombuso yilo eliyisikhungo esikhulu esisebenza lezi zicelo-zinxephezel
trg_text: Cabinet urges the legal teams of the victims to work expeditiously to finalise the remaining claim The Office of the State Attorney is the central structure that is processing these claim

trg_text: Scientific evidence confirms that vaccinated people stand a better chance of surviving from COVID-19 than unvaccinated peopl Therefore, we must all dispel the unfounded and misleading conspiracy theories about the vaccines and choose life by vaccinatin

src_text: Le ngqungquthela ibuke inqubekela-phambili eseyibe khona ekukhuthazeni nasekuqiniseni ukudidiyela kwesifunda okuhambisana noHlelo lowezi-2020-2030 Olubonisa Amasu Entuthuko ye-SAD IKhabhinethi liqinisekise ukuzinikela kweNingizimu Afrika ekudidiyeleni kwesifunda nezimboni, ikakhulukazi ekusizeni ukuvuselelwa kwe-SADC kubhubhane lwe-COVID-19.
trg_text: Bolstering Productive Capacities in the Face of the COVID-19 Pandemic for Inclusive, Sustainable, Economic and Industrial Transformation .The summit took stock of progress made in promoting and deepening regional integration in line with the SADC Regional Indicative Strategic Development Plan 2020-2033 Cabinet affirmed South Africa s commitment to the region s integration and industrialisation, particularly to aid SADC s recovery from the COVID-19 pandemi Working together, the southern African region will emerge stronger as we mobilise our industrial sectors towards rebuilding our economie Cabinet Decision1.

src_text: UMkhandlu Kazwelonke Obhekene negciwane Ie-Corona (i-NCCC) IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ovela ku-NCCC oveza ukuthi sekugonywe abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyisishiyagalolunye eNingizimu Afrika kuze kube namhlanje, kube kunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyisikhombisa abangakaqedi ukugoma kanye nabangaphezu kwezigidi ezine asebeqedile ukugom
trg_text: Cabinet welcomed the vaccination roll-out plan to increase the uptake of vaccines, particularly in provinces that had shown a reduction in the uptake of vaccine As part of increasing the vaccination roll-out programme, Cabinet approved the vaccination of persons aged between 18 years and 35 years from 20 August 2023.

src_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele uhlelo lokukhishwa kwemigomo oluzonyusa ukukhishwa kwemigomo, ikakhulukazi ezifundazweni eziveze ukuncipha kokusetshenziswa kwemigom Njengengxenye yokwandisa uhlelo lokugoma, iKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukugonywa kwabantu abaphakathi kweminyaka eyi-18 kuya kuma-35 kusukela mhla zingama-20 kuNcwaba 2023.

src_text: Amazwi OkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi okuhalalisa futhi lafisela abalandelayo okuhle: izicishamlilo eziyi-109 nezikhulu eziphethe ezithunywe ngokoHlelo Lwezokusebenza Ngomlilo loMnyango Wezamahlathi, Ezokudoba Nezemvelo ukusiza ekulweni nezinhlelo zokucisha umlilo esifundazweni sase-Monitoba e-CanaduNks Tatjana Schoenmaker, ngokunqoba athole amamedali eyisiliva neyegolide emqhudelwaneni wokubhukuda noNks Bianca Buitendag, ngokunqoba athole imedali eyisiliva emqhudelwaneni wokutshuza emanzini, emidlalweni yama-Olimpiki yakamuva ebeyise-Tokyo, e-Japa Bandizisele ifulegi laseNingizimu Afrika phezuluMn Brad Binder, odlala umjaho wezithuthuthu, ngokundizisela ifulegi laseNingizimu Afrika phezulu ngokunqoba ku-MotoGP Austrian Grand Prix yowezi-202 Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani balaba abalandelayo: uMn Dan Sechaba Montsitsi (67), ongomunye wabaholi abaseMzabalazweni Owaqubuka eSoweto mhla ziyi-16 kuNhlangulana 1976, owalwela inkululeko nentando yeningi labantu ngokuzikhandla, futhi wasebenza njengeLungu lePhalamenduDk Johan van Zyl (63), iSikhulu Esiphezulu ebesinguSihlalo we-Toyota South Africa Motors, okhunjulwe ngobuholi bakhe nempumelelo yenkampani kanye ne-Toyota Motor Europ
